title: How Many Calories Are in a Pita Bread?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a pita bread, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Pita Bread?
assumptions: Standard 6-inch white pita bread (~60 g), plain, no toppings or fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, flour type (white vs. whole wheat), and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard pita bread has about 165 calories and 33 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a pita bread?
faqs.a: About 165 kcal for a standard 6-inch white pita bread.

faqs.q: Is pita bread low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 1 g total fat per pita with minimal saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in one pita bread?
faqs.a: Around 5.5 g protein per standard pita.

faqs.q: Does whole wheat pita have fewer calories?
faqs.a: Slightly fewer at ~155 kcal, but higher in fiber (~4 g).

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in pita bread?
faqs.a: Approximately 320 mg per pita; varies by brand and recipe.
